name: Amargasaurus Saddle
description: A durable saddle for riding an Amargasaurus, designed to handle its spiked body.

name: Dakosaurus Saddle
description: A marine saddle for riding the Dakosaurus, giving improved underwater mobility.

name: Dakosaurus Platform Saddle
description: A massive platform saddle for the Dakosaurus, allowing construction of structures on its back while underwater.

name: Deinonychus Saddle
description: A specialized saddle for riding a Deinonychus, offering improved control and protection.

name: Hyaenodon Meatpack Saddle
description: Provides control over a Hyaenodon pack leader for coordinated hunting.
